title: Army Long Trained (19P5)
text:
Set:	Ages End
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Elven
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Condition
Strength:	+1
Game Text:	Bearer must be an [Elven] companion. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may transfer this condition to another [Elven] companion. At the start of the archery phase, you must exert bearer or return this condition to hand.
Rarity:	P
